alert.note: Alert for Hennepin; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 9:41PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN HENNEPIN AND CENTRAL WRIGHT COUNTIES THROUGH 1015 PM CDT... At 941 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Montrose, or near Buffalo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Buffalo, St. Michael, Otsego, Albertville, Delano, Corcoran, Medina, Rockford, Independence, Montrose, Maple Plain, and Hanover. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 198 and 205. U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 130 and 140. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
